CustomField.description: Logical one line output of Address fields (Street1, Street2, City, County, Country, Post Code)
CustomField.formula: if(LEN( Street1__c ) > 0, Street1__c & ", " , "" ) & if(LEN( Street2__c )> 0, Street2__c & ", " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN( City__c )> 0, City__c & ", " , ", " ) & BR() & if(LEN( Country__c ) > 0, Country__c& ", " , ", " ) & BR() & If(LEN( Postcode__c ) > 0, Postcode__c, "" )
CustomField.label: Address
